generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian area alongside the road, separated by a curb, is visible on the right side, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with commercial signs and windows are visible along the right side of the street, which are buildings.
- vegetation: Numerous tall trees are visible along the left side of the road and in the background, which are vegetation.
- terrain: A strip of grass and dirt is visible along the left edge of the road, which is terrain.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a cloudy sky, which is sky.
- person: Several individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, which are persons.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver car and a black car, which are cars.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the sidewalk and road, which are poles.
- traffic sign: A blue and white "TAXI" sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road, which is a traffic sign.
